description:
11.212 roberts
Apply roberts cross operator to input video stream.

The filter accepts the following option:

delta.description: Set value which will be added to filtered result.

planes.description: Set which planes will be processed, unprocessed planes will be copied. By default value 0xf, all planes will be processed.

scale.description: Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result.
